alert.note: Alert for Jones; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 6:47PM CDT until June 11 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jones County in west central Texas... Northeastern Taylor County in west central Texas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 647 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stith, or near Tye, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hawley around 710 PM CDT. Abilene and Hamby around 725 PM CDT. Nugent around 735 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Impact, Hodges, Lake Fort Phantom Hill and Stith. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 268 and 292. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
